channel.title: Few questions.. need help
channel.description:
hello i would like help with 2 things.
1) how do i make dragon bolts shoot out of a rune c bow, i added it to arrows, it goes to arrows spot but when i try to shoot it says i got no arrows in quiver, is this fixible.
2)how can i make dark bow double hit normally?
